title: Self-Regulation and Social Skills Enhancement Project in Digital Classroom Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital tools, foundational understanding of self-regulation and social skills concepts
context.additional_context: A project-based learning course in a BYOD environment cultivating self-regulated digital tool use and social skills. Targets job seekers, focusing on strengthening practical digital literacy

learning_goals: Learners can apply self-regulation strategies—such as goal setting, time management, and self-monitoring—with over 80% accuracy in digital environments.
Learners enhance empathetic communication skills by incorporating peer feedback into projects using digital collaboration tools.
Learners can complete team project deliverables by utilizing role allocation and conflict resolution strategies within digital media.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
